meanings.definition: Institutions that provide financial services but do not hold a banking license.
meanings.sent1: Many people choose to use nonbanks for their financial needs.
meanings.sent2: The nonbanks play a crucial role in the financial industry.
meanings.sent3: Why did the nonbanks go to the party? To make some 'interest-ing' connections!
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, nonbanks are the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The nonbanks are like financial superheroes, swooping in to save the day.

meanings.definition: The sector of the economy made up of nonbank financial institutions.
meanings.sent1: Investors closely monitor the performance of nonbanks in the economy.
meanings.sent2: Nonbanks contribute significantly to the overall economic growth.
meanings.sent3: The nonbanks in the economy are like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of traditional banks, nonbanks stand out like shining stars.
meanings.sent5: The nonbanks form a strong foundation for the financial landscape of the economy.
